products.name: Classic Creamy
products.description: Our signature smooth blend, perfectly roasted for a rich, consistent flavor that spreads effortlessly.

products.name: Super Crunchy
products.description: Packed with real peanut chunks for that satisfying crunch. Perfect for peanut butter enthusiasts who love texture.

products.name: Organic Natural
products.description: Made with 100% certified organic peanuts. Nothing added, nothing removed. Just pure peanut goodness.

products.name: Honey Roasted
products.description: A touch of natural honey blended with our premium roasted peanuts for a subtly sweet experience.

products.name: Spicy Chili
products.description: A unique blend featuring a hint of Ethiopian chili for those who love a little kick with their peanut butter.

products.name: Protein Plus
products.description: Enhanced with extra protein for athletes and health-conscious consumers. Powerful nutrition meets great taste.

products.name: Chocolate Swirl
products.description: Creamy peanut butter with rich dark chocolate swirls. A decadent treat for chocolate lovers.
